籤詩版本二:
E piʻi pololei i ka hale pālua e peʻe ai, i hoʻopuni ʻia e ka ululāʻau kākalaioa
He lōʻihi ke ola a me ke ola pōkole ʻo Tian Gaojun. Loaʻa i hoʻokahi kūleʻa a nalowale ʻelua poʻe. E hele a puni →.
詩意:
He hōʻailona kēia hexagram no ka mālama ʻana i nā mea kahiko a hoʻololi i kēlā me kēia manawa.
E pōmaikaʻi nā mea a pau inā hiki mai ka manawa.
解曰: E like me ka inu ʻona. E mālama wale. E kali a hiki mai ka manawa. ʻAʻohe pōʻino, ʻaʻohe hewa.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Mauna ʻo Zhang Liangyin
I ka moʻokūʻauhau Han, ʻo Zhang Liang, ʻo Zifang kona inoa aloha, he Korea, ʻo kona mau kūpuna no ʻelima mau hanauna he mau kuhina nui Korea.
I ka wā i luku ai ka mokuʻāina ʻo Qin iā Korea Hema, ua hoʻopuehu ʻo Zhang Liang i kāna waiwai a pau a hele i kahi peʻe, no kona makemake e hoʻopaʻi iā Korea Hema, ua hoʻouna ʻo ia i kahi kanaka ikaika me ka hao hao ma kona kino. ʻO ka hoʻouka ʻana iā Qin Shihuang ma Bolangsha (i kēia manawa ʻo Yuanyang County, Henan Province), ua paʻi ʻo ia i ke kaʻa hope. Ua makemake ka Emepera Mua e hopu ia Zhang Liang a puni ka aina, aole nae i hiki ke hopu ia ia no na malama he umi.
Ma hope mai, ua kōkua ʻo Zhang Liang i ka Mōʻī o Han e hoʻohui i ka honua. Ma hope o kona kūleʻa, hōʻole ʻo ia e uku ʻia a hoʻonoho ʻia i luna, a ma lalo o ke ʻano o ke aʻo ʻana iā Taoism mai Chisongzi (make ʻole).
聖意: E pule no nā pōmaikaʻi ma ka home a no kou palekana ponoʻī (hiki ke wehewehe ʻia ka pōmaikaʻi ma ka lokomaikaʻi) ʻO ka ʻimi ʻana i ka waiwai he mea maʻamau (pale) E kūleʻa nā hana (kali i kahi minuke) ʻAʻole kūlike ka male me Liujia, pōmaikaʻi ke hele i ka kula, he hapa ka maikai o ka enuhe silika, he eono holoholona i pomaikai (hule), imi kanaka, keakea i na hihia o ka lehulehu, poho, he pomaikai ka hele ana (laki ole) ) Poino waiwai, poino no ka mai, pule no ka laki maikai ma na mauna a me na lua kupapau.
第X籤: Kanalimakūmāiwa i lanakila i ka hailona (Lottering)
